Name: PvZ2_Prepreprelease_FF_P2

Updates.en: Added Infi-nut (whose shield as a Zombie), Tile Turnip(won't be counted as dead plants, five colors, αβγΔ textures by  @索菲sophine)
Updates.zh: 新增全息坚果（屏障作为独立的僵尸），瓷砖萝卜（五种颜色，不会被计入死亡，αβγΔ的瓷砖萝卜贴图由

Updates.en: Level Files allow zombies to spawn more flexibly, and allow customized warnings(more details in Official Website)
Updates.zh: 自制关卡方面，僵尸生成更加灵活，可以自定义关卡警告字幕（详见官网）

NewFeatures: 新增全息坚果（屏障作为独立的僵尸），瓷砖萝卜（五种颜色，不会被计入死亡，αβγΔ的瓷砖萝卜贴图由 @索菲sophine 制作）
自制关卡方面，僵尸生成更加灵活，可以自定义关卡警告字幕（详见官网）
EnNewFeatures: Added Infi-nut (whose shield as a Zombie), Tile Turnip(won't be counted as dead plants, five colors, αβγΔ textures by  @索菲sophine)
Level Files allow zombies to spawn more flexibly, and allow customized warnings(more details in Official Website)
